resources.string: A network connection is advised for this app, without one the functionality of the app is limited. Please turn on wi-fi or data to make the most of this app.

Welcome to this app, it's an unofficial implementation of the online dictionary 'Urban Dictionary' that was designed to build upon the popularity of Urban Dictionary by giving it the refreshing makeover that it needed. All the words, definitions, meanings and any associated content belongs to them.

In the navigation drawer there are 3 different pages to choose from which allows different content to be shown when nothing is being searched for, when there is no network available only 'Favourites' will be available. Below these options you can access the settings or a page with information.

To search for a word simply click the search icon in the action bar and begin typing a word, suggestions will appear beneath the search box which you can click. Speech input is available by tapping the microphone icon.

To favourite a definition, simply click the heart icon on an item, this will now allow it to be shown in the favourites panel. You can also share a definition on social networks or to your friends by simply long clicking on a word.

I hope you enjoy using this app and if you do please feel free to leave a review, thanks!


Developed by Lewis Deane
